name: nouvelle
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or involving nouvelle cuisine (= a style of cooking in which light, fresh food is cooked gently and without rich sauces, and served in attractive patterns on the plate in small amounts): Dining on nouvelle Caribbean food at the hotel is a memorable gastronomic experience. The restaurant serves Nouvelle Cantonese cuisine.
More examplesFewer examplesThe restaurant offers nouvelle and regular American food. This award-winning restaurant serves innovative nouvelle food, focusing on high-quality local produce.This is a nouvelle French eatery that serves up exquisite food.The website has traditional and nouvelle recipes from well-known food writers and chefs.The eatery serves the food of Southern India with some nouvelle twists.There were complaints that the cuisine was a bit too nouvelle.
